alert.note: Alert for Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 9:40PM CDT until June 24 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central North Dakota, including Wells County. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 939 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has fallen due to prior thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing in north central Wells County. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fessenden, Heimdal, Bremen, Manfred and Hamberg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
